pageContext.claim: “Drug companies, a number of months ago, were going to raise their prices. I actually called up the heads of Pfizer and Novartis and others. I said you can't do that. You can't raise your prices. And you know what they did? They brought them down, they didn't raise them. And that's when I realized being the president of the United States is a very powerful position.”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but then announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019. Pfizer did not drop its prices.
